TopicTitle: Should propellers be added to KSP?

Articles.Content:
Do you guys think that propeller engines should be added to KSP? Propellers would serve as precursors to Jet engines in Career mode. They would have less thrust, but would drain fuel slower. They would also be cheaper than other jet engines.

Edited June 19, 2018 by NotLukeSkywalker

This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions & Development. 

Are you sure your're not Luke Skywalker? 

Have you checked?

Greets,

The Airplane Plus mod does offer a crazy number of prop engines that are fun to have but do not necessarily add anything to a Career game. At least at the 64-bit version 1.4.3 level the Mod seems to run with no noticeable bugs or slow downs on my low-spec machine.

 

Take care,

 

Regards

Frank
Do you moderators mind closing/locking this thread? I think that it should be closed.
